column1: lalaith is a noun meaning "laughter" in Sindarin.Didier Willis
column2: http://www.jrrvf.com/hisweloke/sindar/online/english.html Hiswelókës Sindarin Dictionary at http://www.jrrvf.com/haut.shtml Jrrvf.com (accessed 19 July 2011)

column1: It is possible that this word shows influence from lala- in Quenya
In Common Eldarin the stem for laugh is g-lada-
